title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 35.8 - Birth and death certification; form and content
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 35.8 - Birth and death certification; form and content

State Regulations
(a) The signature of those persons executing, authenticating or filing such certificates may be constructed digitally for certificates of birth and death prepared in the electronic format provided by the commissioner. (b) A digital signature means the creation by the computer of an electronic identifier which the commissioner determines is: (1)
unique to the signer; (2)
capable of verification; (3)
under the signer's control; and
(4)
linked to data in such a manner that if the data is changed, the signature is invalidated. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
35.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
